Package tr.edu.ku.devnull.needforspear.Viewmodel.Database

Class FirebaseDatabase

java.lang.Object
tr.edu.ku.devnull.needforspear.Viewmodel.Database.FirebaseDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameDatabase
public class FirebaseDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameDatabase
FirebaseDatabase is a database to store user activity. It implements the methods from the GameDatabase to obtain dependency injection.
Author:
Kaan Turkmen

    • updatePlayerOnDatabase

      private void updatePlayerOnDatabase​(com.google.firebase.database.DataSnapshot dataSnapshot, Player player)
      Helper method of the updatePlayer method. Updates the score, lives and the listofSpells of the given player.
      Parameters:
      dataSnapshot - Current database snapshot to be searched in.
      player - Player who will be updated.

    • confirmUser

      private void confirmUser​(com.google.firebase.database.DataSnapshot dataSnapshot, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String verificationCode)
      Helper method of the confirmPlayer method. Updates database if operation is successful and it is making verified property of the user true in the database.
      Parameters:
      dataSnapshot - Current database snapshot to be searched in.
      email - Email to be confirmed.
      verificationCode - Verification code to be checked to verify.

    • resetPlayerPassword

      private void resetPlayerPassword​(com.google.firebase.database.DataSnapshot dataSnapshot, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String verificationCode, java.lang.String newPassword)
      Helper method of the resetPassword method. Updates databases password and verified properties if the operation is successful.
      Parameters:
      dataSnapshot - Current database snapshot to be searched in.
      email - New password to be set for the given email associated account.
      verificationCode - Verification code to be checked to verify.
      newPassword - New password to be updated the old one.

    • sendNewVerification

      private void sendNewVerification​(com.google.firebase.database.DataSnapshot dataSnapshot, java.lang.String email)
      Helper method of forgotPassword method. Generates a new verificationCode and updates the old one.
      Parameters:
      dataSnapshot - Current database snapshot to be searched in.
      email - verificationCode to be updated for the given email associated account.

      private java.lang.Integer checkIfValidCredentials​(Player p1, Player p2)
      Checks if given two players are identical.
      Parameters:
      p1 - Player 1 to be compared with.
      p2 - Player 2 to be compared with.
      Returns:
      Integer response from the database.

    • loadMapFromDatabase

      private void loadMapFromDatabase​(com.google.firebase.database.DataSnapshot dataSnapshot, Player player)
      Helper method of loadGame method. Finds a associated map with the user. Notifies LoadSaveSubscribers afterwards.
      Parameters:
      dataSnapshot - Current database snapshot to be searched in.
      player - Player who will be searched to obtain GameMap from.

    • findRegisteredUser

      private void findRegisteredUser​(com.google.firebase.database.DataSnapshot dataSnapshot, Player player)
      Helper method of the login method. Finds a registered user's account from the database. Notifies AuthSubscribers afterwards.
      Parameters:
      dataSnapshot - Current database snapshot to be searched in.
      player - Player who will be searched in the database.

    • checkIfUserExistsAndRegister

      private void checkIfUserExistsAndRegister​(com.google.firebase.database.DataSnapshot dataSnapshot, Player player)
      Helper method of the register method. Checks if player account of given credentials already exists on the database. If not, registers the user.
      Parameters:
      dataSnapshot - Current database snapshot to be searched in.
      player - Player who will be searched and registered in the database.
